page.title: 19Politics in Glanaman area.
page.content: Traditionally this area is a stronghold of the Labour Party and regularly returns members of this party as council representatives in the three different tiers of local government- the Cwmaman Town Council, the Dinefwr Borough Council and the Dyfed County Council. The only other party of note in the area is Plaid Cymru, the Welsh Nationalist Party. Locally this party is supported mainly by people who have a great interest in Welsh culture and traditions. This year the sitting Labour councillor on Dyfed County Council was not re-selected by the local branch of the Labour Party as its candidate, but he decided to stand as an Independant. In a three-cornered contest he defeated the Official Labour Candidate and the Plaid Cymru Candidate.
